Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: Fink U., MT. BIGELOW IMAGES OF 9P/TEMPEL 1, EAR-C-LPLCCD-3-BGLO61-IMG-TMPL1-DI-V1.0, NASA Planetary Data System, 2005.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Images of 9P/Tempel 1 taken in 1994 with the LPL Visual CCD on the Mt. Bigelow 61-inch Kuiper telescope by Uwe Fink.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This data set contains 6 images of 9P/Tempel 1 obtained on five nights in 1994 using a visual CCD mounted on the 61-inch Kuiper telescope of the Mt. Bigelow observatory site. Insufficient documentation on the instrument and data analysis were presented to bring the data to review. The images are being saved in the hopes that documentation may be recovered or discovered.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= This data set presents six images of 9P/Tempel 1 obtained on five nights in 1994 using a visual CCD mounted on the 61-inch Kuiper telescope of the Mt. Bigelow observatory site. Insufficient documentation on the instrument and data analysis were presented to bring the data to review. The images are being saved in the hopes that documentation may be recovered or discovered.
Processing ========== At least some processing has been done to these images using IRAF.
Media/Format ============ The data are available on-line for immediate downloading by hardy souls.
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview ========================= User should note well that there is no documentation on what processing was performed on the images, the quality of the seeing on the nights of observation, or any ancillary data used to produce them.
Review ====== The data were not sufficiently documented to bring to review.
